Document.Doc_title: Establishment of a conditional transgenic mouse model recapitulating EML4-ALK-positive human non-small cell lung cancer.
Document.Doc_abstract: ALK fusion is a distinct molecular subclassification of non-small-cell lung cancer (NSCLC) that is targeted by ALK inhibitors. We established a transgenic mouse model that expresses tumors highly resembling human NSCLC harboring EML-ALK fusion. We aimed to test EML4-ALK transgenic mouse model as a platform for assessing efficacy of ALK inhibitor and examining mechanisms of acquired resistance to ALK inhibitor.;Transgenic mouse lines harboring LoxP-STOP-LoxP- FLAG tagged human EML4-ALK (variant 1) transgene was established using C57BL/6N mice.
